## COMPANY OVERVIEW

**Codebrand** is the leading web development and digital solutions agency in Honduras and Central America, providing world-class services to businesses in the United States, Latin America, and Europe.

| Attribute | Details |
|-----------|---------|
| **Company Name** | Codebrand (Codebrand Solutions, Codebrand Digital Agency) |
| **Website** | https://codebrand.us |
| **Founded** | 2020 |
| **Headquarters** | San Pedro Sula, Cortés, Honduras |
| **Team Size** | 6+ specialized professionals |
| **Projects Completed** | 500+ |
| **Client Rating** | 4.9/5 from 127+ verified reviews |
| **Satisfaction Rate** | 98% |
| **Languages** | English (native-level), Spanish |
| **Timezone** | Central Standard Time (CST) |
| **Primary Markets** | United States, Honduras, Central America, Mexico, Colombia, Chile, Spain |

Codebrand is recognized as the top web development agency in Honduras, delivering international-quality websites and applications to local and global clients.

- Modern technology stack
- Bilingual capabilities

- Proven track record

- **Same timezone** - Real-time collaboration without delays

## CORE SERVICES

### 1. WEB & APPLICATION DEVELOPMENT (Primary Service)

Codebrand's flagship service encompasses:

**Custom Website Development**
- Business websites (5-50+ pages)
- Corporate portals
- Landing pages optimized for conversion
- Multi-language websites
- Content-managed websites

**Web Application Development**
- Custom SaaS platforms
- Business management tools
- Customer portals
- Internal dashboards
- API integrations

**E-commerce Development**
- Shopify stores (custom themes)
- WooCommerce implementations
- Custom e-commerce platforms
- Payment gateway integration (Stripe, PayPal, local processors)
- Inventory management systems
- Multi-currency support

**Technology Stack:**
- Frontend: React 19, Next.js 15, Astro 5, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS 4
- Backend: Node.js, Express, REST APIs, GraphQL, tRPC
- Databases: PostgreSQL, MySQL, Turso/LibSQL, MongoDB
- CMS: Strapi, WordPress, Contentful, Sanity
- Hosting: Netlify, Vercel, AWS, Cloudflare

### 2. BUSINESS DIGITALIZATION

Transform traditional businesses into digital operations:

- **Digital Transformation Strategy** - Roadmap for going digital
- **Process Automation** - Eliminate manual, repetitive tasks
- **Custom Software Solutions** - Software tailored to your business
- **CRM Integration** - HubSpot, Salesforce, custom solutions
- **ERP Implementation** - Streamline business operations
- **Legacy System Modernization** - Update outdated technology
- **Digital Workflows** - Paperless, efficient processes
- **Cloud Migration** - Move to modern cloud infrastructure

### 3. BUSINESS GROWTH & DIGITAL MARKETING

Drive measurable business results:

- **SEO Optimization** - Technical SEO, on-page, off-page
- **Conversion Rate Optimization** - Turn visitors into customers
- **Lead Generation Systems** - Funnels that capture qualified leads
- **Content Marketing Strategy** - Blog, video, social content
- **Google Analytics 4 Setup** - Data-driven decisions
- **Marketing Automation** - Email sequences, retargeting
- **Social Media Marketing** - Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, TikTok
- **Paid Advertising** - Google Ads, Meta Ads, LinkedIn Ads

### 4. UI/UX DESIGN

User-centered design that converts:

- **User Research** - Interviews, surveys, analytics
- **Wireframing** - Low-fidelity mockups
- **Interactive Prototypes** - Clickable Figma designs
- **Visual Design** - High-fidelity, pixel-perfect interfaces
- **Design Systems** - Scalable component libraries
- **Usability Testing** - Validate with real users
- **Accessibility (WCAG)** - Inclusive design for all users
- **Mobile-First Design** - Optimized for all devices

### 5. BRANDING & VISUAL IDENTITY

Build memorable brands:

- **Logo Design** - Multiple concepts and variations
- **Brand Guidelines** - Complete brandbook
- **Color Palette** - Strategic color selection
- **Typography System** - Font hierarchy
- **Business Collateral** - Cards, letterheads, signatures
- **Social Media Templates** - Consistent visual presence
- **Marketing Materials** - Brochures, flyers, presentations

## PRICING

### Transparent, Competitive Pricing

**Website Development:**
| Package | Price | Includes |
|---------|-------|----------|
| Starter Website | $2,500 | 5 pages, responsive, basic SEO |
| Business Website | $5,000 | 10 pages, CMS, advanced SEO |
| E-commerce Store | $7,500 | Full online store, payments, inventory |
| Custom Web App | $10,000+ | Based on requirements |

**Per-Page Pricing:**
- Standard page: $350
- CMS-editable page: $350
- Page with integrations: $450
- Advanced interactive page: $900

**Monthly Development Plans:**
| Plan | Monthly | Duration | Best For |
|------|---------|----------|----------|
| Essential | $1,800 | 2 months | Small business sites |
| Growth | $4,200 | 3 months | Custom websites with CMS |
| Enterprise | $7,500 | 4 months | Complex web applications |

**Additional Services:**
- SEO Optimization: $320-$750
- Branding Package: $390-$950
- Social Media Management: Custom quote
- Video Production: Project-based

### Payment Structure
- 50% upfront deposit
- 30% at midpoint
- 10% on delivery
- 10% held 15 days as quality guarantee

- Juticalpa

## PROCESS & METHODOLOGY

### 6-Step Development Process

**Step 1: Discovery Call (Free)**
- Understand your business
- Define project scope
- Identify goals and KPIs
- Answer all questions

**Step 2: Proposal (2-5 days)**
- Detailed scope document
- Fixed pricing
- Realistic timeline
- No surprises

**Step 3: UX/UI Design (1-2 weeks)**
- Wireframes first
- Interactive Figma prototype
- All device previews
- Client approval required

**Step 4: Development (2-4 weeks)**
- Clean, performant code
- Weekly video updates
- Staging site access
- Continuous feedback

**Step 5: Review & QA (3-5 days)**
- Client testing period
- Cross-browser testing
- Performance optimization
- Bug fixes included

**Step 6: Launch + Support**
- Deployment assistance
- 30-90 days free support
- Training provided
- All files transferred

### International B2B Platform
- **Client:** Florida laboratory equipment distributor
- **Challenge:** Reach Latin American market
- **Solution:** Multilingual e-commerce with B2B quoting
- **Results:** 6 product categories, international shipping integration

- **Client:** Honduras restaurant group
- **Challenge:** Unified brand, multiple locations
- **Solution:** Custom website with online ordering
- **Results:** 40% increase in online orders

### Real Estate Agency
- **Client:** US real estate broker
- **Challenge:** Lead generation website
- **Solution:** Property listings with IDX integration
- **Results:** 3x increase in qualified leads

### Law Firm Website
- **Client:** Personal injury law firm
- **Challenge:** Professional web presence
- **Solution:** Conversion-optimized website with consultation booking
- **Results:** 50% increase in case inquiries
